import React from 'react' export default function Question(props) { console.log(props) const answersArray = props.incorrect.map(answer => `

${answer}

` ) answersArray.push(`

${props.correct}

`) console.log(answersArray) return ( <>

{props.question}

dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{__html:answersArray}}
) }
